title: Nordic Tales - Ages of War
description: Ages of War is an intense, orchestral score for battles and also includes 2 loops for great ambiences.
longDescription:
"Ages of War" is the 4th release from the Nordic Tales series.

Create your own breath-taking battle music and tense, orchestral atmospheres with this music pack, containing 4 loops (24 stems, 72 files in total). Loop 1 and 2 are perfect for battles and intense action, Loop 3 and 4 are way more atmospheric and great for anything in between.


Check out the walkthrough video on youtube!

https://youtu.be/vKiMeVzDyhw
technicalDetails:
This package includes:


  • Loop 1 ( for big battles)
  • Loop 2 (an additional, shorter version of Loop 1)
  • Loop 3 and 4 (great for ambiences)


Find the complete track list here:

Tracklist


Also, each loop and each stem comes with a head and a tail version for maximum flexibility!

Learn more about heads and tails:

How to customize your score


Number of Audio Wavs: 72

Number of Audio Cues: 72

Sample rate / bit rate: 44100 Hz, 16 bit, stereo .WAV

Does music loop: Yes, all loops and loopable stems are absolutely seamless.

Minutes of audio provided: ~ 25:00 (you can create hours of music)



Please note: if you'd like to convert the WAV files into Mp3s, please use a good converter. Some cheap or free software will add a few milliseconds of silence at the beginning of each converted file, which means, a loop might not be seamless anymore.
